tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE microbial_strains (
  strain_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strain_name VARCHAR(255),
  species VARCHAR(100),
  origin_country VARCHAR(50),
  isolation_source VARCHAR(100),
  growth_conditions VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE microbial_strains (
  strain_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strain_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  source_country VARCHAR(100),
  isolation_date DATE,
  characteristics JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE strain_characteristics (
  characteristic_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  strain_id INT,
  growth_rate FLOAT,
  morphology TEXT,
  resistance BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (strain_id) REFERENCES microbial_strains(strain_id)
);

CREATE TABLE microbial_strains (strain_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
strain_name VARCHAR(255),
genus VARCHAR(100),
species VARCHAR(100),
isolated_location VARCHAR(255),
isolation_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE strain_characteristics (characteristic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
strain_id INT,
characteristic_name VARCHAR(255),
characteristic_value VARCHAR(255),
FOREIGN KEY (strain_id) REFERENCES microbial_strains(strain_id));

CREATE TABLE research_projects (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
project_title VARCHAR(255),
start_date DATE,
end_date DATE,
lead_researcher VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE microbial_characteristics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strain_id INT,
    growth_rate FLOAT,
    temperature INT,
    humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lab_id INT,
    strain_id INT,
    experiment_date DATE,
    result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE strains (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 species VARCHAR(255),
 origin VARCHAR(255),
 date_collected DATE
 );

CREATE TABLE characteristics (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 strain_id INT,
 growth_rate FLOAT,
 temperature FLOAT,
 ph FLOAT,
 FOREIGN KEY (strain_id) REFERENCES strains(id)
 );

CREATE TABLE researches (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
 duration INT,
 start_date DATE,
 strain_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (strain_id) REFERENCES strains(id)
 );

CREATE TABLE measurements (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 characteristic_id INT,
 value FLOAT,
 unit VARCHAR(255),
 FOREIGN KEY (characteristic_id) REFERENCES characteristics(id)
 );
